extension_description.message: An extension that helps you to deal with ed2k/eMule/eDonkey links in bulk, with functions of select range and filename search.

error_scope.message: Select range error. Please enter a correct number.

error_overlimit.message: Value exceeds valid range. Please enter a correct number.

scope_tips.message: (Items will be selected after you confirm.)

search_tips.message: (Selected items won't be cleared after return.)
